title: Ayurveda Therapies & Treatments | YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts
description: Ayurveda Therapies at YO1 Catskills, NYC. Our Ayurvedic therapies & treatments offer a truly authentic and customized experience created for individual guests.
cleaned_text: Practitioners who are experts in ancient Ayurveda therapies address the root cause of each guest's health issues during an immersive, regimented stay and incorporate a variety of healing techniques to treat and educate those dedicated and committed to living a better life. AYURVEDIC THERAPIES ABHYANGAM Relaxing Body Massage Therapy Abhyangam is an Ayurvedic full-body massage done with medicated oil to help balance the doshas. SHIRO ABHYANGAM Ayurvedic Head Massage This therapy promotes peace and tranquility and high levels of alertness and concentration. PADA ABHYANGAM Ayurvedic Foot Massage Enjoy this restorative foot massage to ease away fatigue and boost performance. PODIKIZHI Herbal Powder Poultice Therapy This therapy uses herbal powder and oil, in which powders are made into boluses using cloth (potli). SHIRODHARA Calming Ayurvedic Head Therapy In this therapy, a stream of warm medicated oil is poured onto the guest's forehead in a rhythmic movement with gentle rubbing. UDHWARTHANAM Herbal Powder Massage Therapy Reinvigorate your body and restore its vitality with this comforting full-body therapy. PICHU Herbal Cotton Oil Therapy GREEVA PICHU Neck Therapy Enjoy this specialized neck massage to restore comfort and ease to your neck. KATI PICHU Back Therapy Ease pain and tension in your back with this reparative back therapy. JANU PICHU Knee Joints Therapy The Janu Pichu therapy is designed to offer relief from all kinds of knee problems. MERUDANDA PICHU Spinal Care Therapy This restorative healing technique helps in the treatment of slipped disc, disc prolapse, spinal degeneration, muscle spasms and pain.
